text:
About efficiently: I recently check our @QuarkusIO application (10 components, around 60 replicas), it's a Kafka messaging app and at our current peak usage (around 250k msg/min) CPU consumption is around 10% (of 0,5 CPU) and heap memory around 60MB.

2/3

author.name: Lo√Øc Mathieu | @loicmathieu@mastodon.online

Like to learn stuff and share what I learnt.
